name: Edward GOODMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Goodman v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Edward GOODMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of June, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Jason Talaber, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, PA, for appellee Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
96 A.3d 986
Edward GOODMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 16, 2014.
Edward Goodman, Pro Se.
John Jason Talaber, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, PA, for appellee Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
